PreceptDef.label: godlike
PreceptDef.description:
Our leader should be exalted as a god, to treat them as any less assures our demise.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - Opinion of the leader depends on a person's certainty in its ideoligion.

PreceptDef.label: best crafter
PreceptDef.description:
Our most skilled artisan is our leader, through their keen eye and delicate touch our workshops will sing the song of creation.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - The leader role will periodically be forced upon the highest level crafter in the colony (this will only work if the ideology is the primary one).

PreceptDef.label: best fighter
PreceptDef.description: Martial expertise, be it with a blade or spear is a show of strength and courage. Our most talented fighter will be our leader, no questions asked (this will only work if the ideology is the primary one).

PreceptDef.label: three
PreceptDef.description:
Itâ€™s vital that we put our trust in the hands of few rather than the hand of one.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - Up to three people can be designated as leader.

PreceptDef.label: moralist
PreceptDef.description:
Our leader is a morale bastion, and through them and their divinity we shall flourish.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - The colony's leader can use moralist abilities too.
